item.title: VSCode Setup and Usage
item.description: Installation Download from here Installation Options Accept the default installation path keep “Register Code as an editor for supported file types” checked keep “Add to PATH” checked other options: set to your preference Ubuntu-specific cd ~/Downloads sudo dpkg -i code_1.
